mapper.select: SELECT target_id AS targetId, target_type AS targetType, target_field AS targetField, content FROM `fulltextindex_content_${moduleId}` WHERE target_id in #{k}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `fulltextindex_content_${moduleId}` (`target_id`, `target_type`, `target_field`, `content`) VALUES (#{contentVo.targetId}, #{contentVo.targetType}, #{contentVo.targetField}, #{contentVo.content,typeHandler=CompressHandler}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `content` = #{contentVo.content,typeHandler=CompressHandler}
mapper.delete: DELETE a,b,c FROM fulltextindex_field_${moduleId} a LEFT JOIN fulltextindex_offset_${moduleId} b ON a.`id` = b.field_id LEFT JOIN fulltextindex_content_${moduleId} c ON a.target_id = c.target_id AND a.target_type = c.target_type WHERE a.`target_id` = #{fullTextIndexVo.targetId} and a.`target_type` = #{fullTextIndexVo.targetType}
